activities.loc: JMB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Joshua F Michels

records.addlTxt:
11:21 AM Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by phone, in custody, in Dodge Correctional.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney Daniel P Repka appeared by video for Joshua F Michels.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Joshua F Michels. 
Attorney Repka to represent from here on.
Court relates. 
Reading of Information waived. 
NG plea entered on each count. 
Bond to continue.
Status hearing scheduled for December 7, 2022 at 10:00 am.

Adjustment Number: 22A 068653,
Payable Number: 128529,
Receipt Number: 22RP002294,
Amount: $20.00

3:23 PM Attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Michelle M Erdman in court for Joshua F Michels. Defendant Joshua F Michels in court, in custody. 

3:24 PM Detective Michael Carroll, called, sworn and direct by State.
3:28 PM  Cross by Attorney Erdman.

Court finds probable cause and binds over.
Arraignment scheduled for October 26, 2022 at 11:15 am.

Preliminary hearing on October 6, 2022 at 03:15 pm.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail
Jail notified of hearing by email

9:51 AM Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by video, in custody - was on zoom previously but court needed to restart software - Jail did not come back into hearing.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Joshua F Michels - was on zoom previously but court needed to restart software.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Court relates. Attorney Michelle M Erdman related off the record that she has another hearing at 9:45 am and needed to leave hearing and will contact JA to reset this hearing. Attorney Seidlitz relates. Court relates there was no waiver of the time limits previously and hearing will need to be set timely. 
Hearing is adjourned and will need to be set.
Preliminary hearing on September 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.

11:34 AM Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Michelle M Erdman appeared by video for Joshua F Michels.  Prosecuting attorney John Michael O'Boyle in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Formal reading of complaint waived. Preliminary hearing set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for September 15, 2022 at 09:30 am.
Adjourned initial appearance on September 9, 2022 at 11:30 am.; sent to Defendant at BC Jail on 8/22/22

8:29 AM Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by video, in custody.  Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Counsel has not been obtained despite defendant being eligible for representation. JA to contact the SPD office to obtain status of obtaining an attorney. 

No future date set at this time. JA to schedule the next court date. 
CC: BC Jail.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

Adjourned initial appearance on August 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.
NOH sent to Def at Barron Co Jail

1:37 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Joshua F Michels.
Court relates.  Defendant needs to contact the Public Defender's office.  Must appear in person for next date.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 19, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

1:10 PM Prosecuting attorney Brady James Seidlitz in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Joshua F Michels appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Alex Kitto appeared by video for Joshua F Michels.
Court relates. Court instructs Defendant to contact the Public Defender's office and if he does not qualify to complete a blue form. 1:13 State requests cash bond. 1:14 Defendant and Attorney Kitto put in a break out room. 1:19 Attorney Kitto relates. Court orders bond.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 5, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
